title: "DeepMind Trains 80 Billion Parameter AI Vision-Language Model Flamingo"
excerpt: "DeepMind recently trained Flamingo, an 80B parameter vision-language model (VLM) AI. Flamingo combines separately pre-trained vision and language models and outperforms all other few-shot learning models on 16 vision-language benchmarks."
